005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunctionExecutor;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.net.URI;
019import java.util.List;
020
021import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Provides a generic implementation of methods defined by <a href=
027 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#numeric-value-functions">XPath 3.1
028 * Functions on numeric values</a>.
029 */
030public final class NumericFunction implements IFunctionExecutor {
031
032  @NonNull
033  private final INumericExecutor executor;
034
035  @NonNull
036  static IFunction signature(@NonNull URI namespace, @NonNull String name, @NonNull INumericExecutor executor) {
037    return signature(ObjectUtils.notNull(namespace.toASCIIString()), name, executor);
038  }
039
040  @NonNull
041  static IFunction signature(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String name, @NonNull INumericExecutor executor) {
042    return IFunction.builder()
043        .name(name)
044        .namespace(namespace)
045        .deterministic()
046        .contextIndependent()
047        .focusIndependent()
048        .argument(IArgument.builder()
049            .name("arg1")
050            .type(INumericItem.class)
051            .zeroOrOne()
052            .build())
053        .returnType(INumericItem.class)
054        .returnZeroOrOne()
055        .functionHandler(newFunctionHandler(executor))
056        .build();
057  }
058
059  @NonNull
060  static IFunction signature(@NonNull QName qname, @NonNull INumericExecutor executor) {
061    return signature(
062        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(qname.getNamespaceURI(), "the namespace URI must not be null"),
063        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(qname.getLocalPart(), "the localpart must not be null"),
064        executor);
065  }
066
067  @NonNull
068  static NumericFunction newFunctionHandler(@NonNull INumericExecutor executor) {
069    return new NumericFunction(executor);
070  }
071
072  private NumericFunction(@NonNull INumericExecutor executor) {
073    this.executor = executor;
074  }
075
076  @Override
077  public ISequence<INumericItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
078      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
079      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
080      IItem focus) {
081
082    ISequence<? extends INumericItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
083        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
084    if (sequence.isEmpty()) {
085      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
086    }
087
088    INumericItem item = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
089    if (item == null) {
090      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
091    }
092
093    INumericItem result = executor.execute(item);
094    return ISequence.of(result);
095  }
096
097  @FunctionalInterface
098  public interface INumericExecutor {
099    /**
100     * Perform the execution using the provided {@code item}.
101     *
102     * @param item
103     *          the item to operate on
104     * @return the numeric result from the execution
105     */
106    @NonNull
107    INumericItem execute(@NonNull INumericItem item);
108  }
109}
